thread.title: One killed in apartment fire at Trump Tower in New York

title: One killed in apartment fire at Trump Tower in New York
text:
One killed in apartment fire at Trump Tower in New York 3:07pm BST - 01:38 
One man was killed and six firefighters received minor injuries in an apartment fire on the 50th floor of Trump Tower in New York on Saturday, in a blaze that was quickly extinguished, authorities said. New York City Fire Dept. Commissioner Daniel Nigro said no member of President Trump's family was in the building at the time. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
